GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiChart class.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsBold
params.description: Specifies if the chart title is written in bold font or not.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the horizontal axis of the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsBold
params.description: Specifies if the horizontal axis title is written in bold font or not.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the vertical axis of the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsBold
params.description: Specifies if the vertical axis title is written in bold font or not.

params.name: bIsMinMax
params.description: The true value will set the normal data direction for the vertical axis (from minimum to maximum).

params.name: bIsMinMax
params.description: The true value will set the normal data direction for the horizontal axis (from minimum to maximum).

params.name: sLegendPos
params.description: The position of the chart legend inside the chart window.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

SetShowDataLabels.name: SetShowDataLabels
SetShowDataLabels.description: Specifies which chart data labels are shown for the chart.

params.name: bShowSerName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table column names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowCatName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table row names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowVal
params.description: Whether to show or hide the chart data values.

params.name: bShowPercent
params.description: Whether to show or hide the percent for the data values (works with stacked chart types).

SetShowPointDataLabel.name: SetShowPointDataLabel
SetShowPointDataLabel.description: Spicifies the show options for data labels.

params.name: nSeriesIndex
params.description: The series index from the array of the data used to build the chart from.

params.name: nPointIndex
params.description: The point index from this series.

params.name: bShowSerName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table column names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowCatName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table row names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowVal
params.description: Whether to show or hide the chart data values.

params.name: bShowPercent
params.description: Whether to show or hide the percent for the data values (works with stacked chart types).

SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition.name: SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition
SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition.description: Spicifies tick labels position for the vertical axis.

params.name: sTickLabelPosition
params.description: The type for the position of chart vertical tick labels.

SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition.name: SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition
SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition.description: Spicifies tick labels position for the horizontal axis.

params.name: sTickLabelPosition
params.description: The type for the position of chart horizontal tick labels.

SetHorAxisMajorTickMark.name: SetHorAxisMajorTickMark
SetHorAxisMajorTickMark.description: Specifies major tick mark for the horizontal axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetHorAxisMinorTickMark.name: SetHorAxisMinorTickMark
SetHorAxisMinorTickMark.description: Specifies minor tick mark for the horizontal axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetVertAxisMajorTickMark.name: SetVertAxisMajorTickMark
SetVertAxisMajorTickMark.description: Specifies major tick mark for the vertical axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetVertAxisMinorTickMark.name: SetVertAxisMinorTickMark
SetVertAxisMinorTickMark.description: Specifies minor tick mark for the vertical axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

SetHorAxisLablesFontSize.name: SetHorAxisLablesFontSize
SetHorAxisLablesFontSize.description: Specifies font size for labels of the horizontal axis.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

SetVertAxisLablesFontSize.name: SetVertAxisLablesFontSize
SetVertAxisLablesFontSize.description: Specifies font size for labels of the vertical axis.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

GetNextChart.name: GetNextChart
GetNextChart.description: Returns the next inline chart if exists.

GetPrevChart.name: GetPrevChart
GetPrevChart.description: Returns the previous inline chart if exists.
